document.full_text: the boston celtics burst past san antonio at the end of the third quarter to post a 107-97 victory thursday and consign the spurs to their longest losing streak in 14 years.
document.title: nba's celtics hand slumping spurs fifth successive loss
lines_and_colors: the boston celtics burst past san antonio at the end of the third quarter to post a 107-97 victory thursday and consign the spurs to their longest losing streak in 14 years.
